entry.title: Deep Tissue Therapy Massage Gun
entry.summary:
Vendor: Wireless Xplosion Ltd
Type: Massage Gun
Price: 29.99

  • Ergonomic handheld design, easy operation, lightweight and portable, let you enjoy deep muscle massage anytime anywhere.
  • Equipped with massage head for precise massage to give your body all-round care
  • Relieve various discomforts like fatigue, relieve soreness, make your fitness effect more significant 
  • Suitable for all kinds of people 
  • Small size but powerful 4-speed mode to awaken muscle vitality 
  • Specifications :
    Product Dimension : 95*145*43mm
    Rotating Speed : 2400-3200rpm
    Charging Time : 3 hrs
    Working time : 6 hrs
    Battery Capacity : 1800mAh Max
    Noise : 50dB
    Rated Input : 5V,2A

entry.title: Simpl Touch 2.0 - Magnetic CD Mount
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mighty Mount
Type: Car Mount
Price: 12.99

  • Ultimate ease now delivered with this smooth luxury-  just one simple touch and your phone is secured to put your pedal to the metal.
  • 6 Neodymium Magnets make this the strongest hold on the market, and you the savviest driver on the road.
  • Compatibility with all case-free phones, as well as any with thin profile cases up to .8mm thick (Caseco Skin Shield, Fremont cases, Otterbox Symmetry, Speck cases, and most UAG cases are all compatible with the magnet mount.)
  • Wide range of tilt and rotation means you can always have the perfect view of your screen, whether you’re reclined in cruise control or up-front and center.
  • Compatible CD Mount Grip secures your phone like a fortress to any car CS mount for a no-slip grip you can count on.
  • Talk and drive safely with hands-free connectivity that offers ultimate security for you and your passengers while you enjoy the journey.
